availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James R. Jennings (Hawesville, Kentucky, coal merchant & capt Hancock Co Home Guard)

body.p: Hawesville, Kentucky, merchant and soldier. Virginia native. Married to Catherine Jennings. Father of James Jennings and Kate Jennings. Coal merchant in Hawesville in 1860. Served in the Hancock County Home Guard as captain in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, Hawesville, p. 113.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, Hawesville, p. 40.
KYR-0002-022-0046.
